Simple Process

How It Works

From idea to deployed swarm in minutes, not days.

1

Describe Your Goal

Tell SwarmForge what you need in plain English. No coding required.

2

AI Builds Your Swarm

We automatically generate the optimal agent team and configuration.

3

Deploy & Monitor

Run your swarm, monitor progress, and get results in real-time.

Powerful Features

Everything You Need

Built for teams that need reliable, scalable AI automation.

Multi-Agent Collaboration

Agents work together, share context, and coordinate tasks automatically.

Real-Time Monitoring

Watch your swarms work with live logs, progress bars, and status updates.

Enterprise Security

SOC 2 compliant with end-to-end encryption for all data.

Visual Workflow Builder

Drag-and-drop interface for designing complex agent workflows.

API & Integrations

Connect with 100+ tools including Slack, Notion, and CRMs.

Human-in-the-Loop

Set approval gates and manual checkpoints for critical decisions.
